faire le rapprochement

  1. to put two and two together, to connect the dots, to make the connection (to make connections in one's mind, arriving at a more holistic understanding of a situation)
    Synonym: faire le lien
trans: to put two and two together, to connect the dots, to make the connection

title: faire le rapprochement
